name: Tumblr - 3D Text
description:
**this is no longer going to be updated**

This code makes the text on the Tumblr dashboard look 3D. It also changes the font to 'Raleway' instead. This works best with a dash theme with a dark post background, such as this one. Please leave feedback!
additional_info:
Instructions:
  • To change the text color, go to 'color' and change #fff to the color you want
  • To change the #3D effect colors go to 'text-shadow' and change the #36e8c4 (blue) and #f506a3 (pink) to the colors you want
  • To change the font go to https://fonts.google.com/ and find the font you would like to use and
    • Copy the link that is provided
    • Go to Code 2 and find '@font-face' then 'src' and change the url into the one that you copied
    • In '@font-face' and then 'font-family' and change 'Raleway' to the name of the font
    • Go back to Google Fonts and find 'Specify in CSS' and copy whatever is under it
    • In Code 1 and replace 'font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;' with what you copied
